resources.string: Find a field that you like
There are many fields that you can find here, and you can learn all of them
You can start your journey in the field you love, no need to be afraid of getting lost, we will help you reach the finish line
You can be anything, the world is in your hands
By learning and increasing knowledge you will become a wise person and can change things around you and even the world
Please read the text below carefully so you can understand it
10 points awarded for a correct answer and no marks for an incorrect answer
Tap on option to select the correct answer
Click submit if you are sure you want to complete all the quizzes
